name: From the West
overview: A tale concerning a Halfling and his pal as they battle to return the legendary 'Korat Talons' to their rightful resting-place. During their travels they will encounter many strange creatures and cross parts of the realm they have only heard about in myth and legend. To assist you in this quest there is an extensive 'information routine' built in to the game. To learn more about any subject you may encounter along the way, simply input 'ASK ABOUT (SUBJECT)' and Caz will be more than happy to tell you what she knows.
